name: Matanga
description: Are you not afraid of horror anymore? You are mistaken! The inhabitant of these places - Matanga, is always glad to new guests in his lair and is ready to prove to you that there is always a place for fear! Test your ability to survive in a fight with a local maniac. The game is not for the faint of heart!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450 Storage: 4000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 Storage: 4000 MB available space
